page.title: 05Schooldays - A pupils view
page.content: { A PUPILS VIEW}of school begins,summer or winter,rain or shine,with the tune ful sound of the alarm clock at 7.30am. Defying the urge to remain curled up in his warm bed for just another five minutes,he slowly makes his way to the bathroom where he washes himself mechanically in readiness for his gruelling day at school. Once suitably titivated, he dresses himself in his extremely smart green and grey uniform,looks longingly at his crumpled bed,which still appears very inviting and guiltily puts away thoughts of an invented ailment from his honest little mind. After breakfast he leaves the house and either walks or catches a bus to school,by which time he has realised that the essay he thought was due on Friday should be presented today.
